text: The Year of Yahweh’s Favor
\add The\add* Spirit of the Lord Yahweh \add is\add* upon me,
because Yahweh has anointed me,
he has sent me to bring good news \add to the\add* oppressed,
to bind up ⸤the brokenhearted⸥,\f + \fr 61:1 \ft Literally “those broken of heart” \f*
to ⸤proclaim⸥\f + \fr 61:1 \ft Literally “call” \f* release to \add the\add* captives
and liberation to those who are bound,
to ⸤proclaim⸥\f + \fr 61:2 \ft Literally “call” \f* \add the\add* year of Yahweh’s favor,
and our God’s day of vengeance,
to comfort all those in mourning,
to ⸤give⸥\f + \fr 61:3 \ft Literally “place” \f* for those in mourning in Zion,
to give them a head wrap instead of ashes,
\add the\add* oil of joy instead of mourning,
a garment of praise instead of a faint spirit.
And ⸤they will be called⸥\f + \fr 61:3 \ft Literally “it will be called to them” \f* oaks of righteousness,
the planting of Yahweh, to show his glory.
And they shall build \add the\add* ancient ruins,
they shall erect \add the\add* former deserted \add places\add*.
And they shall restore \add the\add* ⸤devastated cities⸥,\f + \fr 61:4 \ft Literally “cities of devastation” \f*
\add the\add* deserted \add places\add* of ⸤many generations⸥.\f + \fr 61:4 \ft Literally “generation and generation” \f*
And strangers shall stand and feed your flocks,\f + \fr 61:5 \ft Hebrew “flock” \f*
and ⸤foreigners⸥\f + \fr 61:5 \ft Literally “sons of a foreign country” \f* \add shall be\add* your farmers and vinedressers.
But\f + \fr 61:6 \ft Or “And” \f* you shall be called the priests of Yahweh,
⸤you will be called⸥\f + \fr 61:6 \ft Literally “it shall be said of you” \f* servers of our God.
You shall eat \add the\add* wealth of \add the\add* nations,
and you shall boast in their riches.
Instead of your shame, a double portion,
and \add instead of\add* insult, they will rejoice \add over\add* their portion.
Therefore they will take a double portion in their land;
⸤they shall possess everlasting joy⸥.\f + \fr 61:7 \ft Literally “possession of joy everlasting shall be for them” \f*
For I, Yahweh, love justice,
hate robbery and\f + \fr 61:8 \ft Or “in” \f* injustice,
and I will ⸤faithfully⸥\f + \fr 61:8 \ft Literally “in \fq the \ft faithfulness” \f* give their reward,
and I will ⸤make⸥\f + \fr 61:8 \ft Literally “cut” \f* an everlasting covenant ⸤with⸥\f + \fr 61:8 \ft Literally “to” \f* them.
And their descendants\f + \fr 61:9 \ft Hebrew “descendant” \f* will be known among the nations,
and their offspring in the midst of the peoples.
All those who see them shall recognize them,
that they \add are\add* descendants\f + \fr 61:9 \ft Hebrew “descendant” \f* \add whom\add* Yahweh has blessed.
I will rejoice greatly in Yahweh;
my being shall shout in exultation in my God.
For he has clothed me \add with\add* garments of salvation,
he has covered me \add with the\add* robe of righteousness,
as \add a\add* bridegroom adorns \add himself\add* \add with\add* a head wrap like a priest,
and as \add a\add* bride adorns herself \add with\add* her jewelry.
For as the earth ⸤produces⸥\f + \fr 61:11 \ft Literally “brings out” \f* its sprout,
and as a garden makes its plants sprout,
so the Lord Yahweh will make righteousness sprout,
and praise before all the nations.
